Headline: #75 74th-75th Temporary Reroute at 74th/Emerald
ShortDescription: 75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via: 74th, Halsted, 76th, Vincennes, and 75th, due to, street blockage, near 74th/Emerald.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via: 74th, Halsted, 76th, Vincennes, and 75th, due to, street blockage, near 74th/Emerald.

Allow extra travel time.
